system.description: Consisting of a glass bottle—normally from an alcoholic beverage—containing a flammable fuel mixture, a bit of motor oil to help it spread, and an alcohol-soaked rag stuffed in the top to act as a wick. When used, the wick is ignited and the bottle hurled at the target; the breaking bottle spreads the agitated mixture, which quickly ignites begins to burn anything in the vicinity. Cheap and effective.
